### 3.1.2 Measures of Price Sensitivity 


#### Slope
The _slope_ of the price0response function measures how depand changes in response to a price change.



### 3.1.3 Price Response and Willingness to Pay 

Following is the fraction of the population that has w.t.p. between $p_1$ and $p_2$
$$
d(p)=D\int_{p_1}^{p_2}w(x)dx
$$


$d(p)-D-mp$

* $D=d(0)$ - demand of zero price 
* satiating price: the price at which the demand drops to zero
